languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс делает шаг назад и обращает к вам ошарашенный взгляд. Спустя мгновение его лицо принимает обычное стоическое выражение.{/n} "Достаточно. В этом ты права, ксенос. В этом..." {n}Хейнрикс медлит — ему тяжело произнести следующие слова.{/n} "...и в ином тоже". {n}Словно лишившись последних сил, Хейнрикс отворачивается от вас.{/n}

{n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс делает шаг назад и обращает к вам ошарашенный взгляд. Спустя мгновение его лицо принимает обычное стоическое выражение.{/n} "Достаточно. В этом ты права, ксенос. В этом..." {n}Хейнрикс медлит — ему тяжело произнести следующие слова.{/n} "...и в ином тоже". {n}Словно лишившись последних сил, Хейнрикс отворачивается от вас.{/n}

About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは一歩下がり、驚いてあなたを見る。しばらくして、普段の毅然とした表情を取り戻す。{/n}「もういい。お前の言うとおりだ、異種族よ。この件に関してはな…」{n}ハインリックスは逡巡して、どうにか次の言葉を繋ぐ。{/n}「…それと、他の件もだ」{n}最後の力を振り絞ったかのように、ハインリックスはあなたから顔をそむける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは一歩下がり、驚いてあなたを見る。しばらくして、普段の毅然とした表情を取り戻す。{/n}「もういい。お前の言うとおりだ、異種族よ。この件に関してはな…」{n}ハインリックスは逡巡して、どうにか次の言葉を繋ぐ。{/n}「…それと、他の件もだ」{n}最後の力を振り絞ったかのように、ハインリックスはあなたから顔をそむける。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希后退一步，震惊地看着你。随即，他的脸上再次恢复了往日不苟言笑的表情。{/n}“好吧。你是对的，异形。还有所有这些……”{n}海因里希吞吞吐吐地说道。{/n}“……有的没的。”{n}他似乎被抽干了最后一丝力气，转身离去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希后退一步，震惊地看着你。随即，他的脸上再次恢复了往日不苟言笑的表情。{/n}“好吧。你是对的，异形。还有所有这些……”{n}海因里希吞吞吐吐地说道。{/n}“……有的没的。”{n}他似乎被抽干了最后一丝力气，转身离去。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix recule d'un pas et vous lance un regard choqué avant de retrouver son expression stoïque habituelle un instant plus tard.{/n} « Il suffit. Vous avez raison, xénos. À propos de ceci... {n}Heinrix hésite et éprouve manifestement quelques difficultés à finir sa phrase.{/n} ... et au sujet de différentes autres choses également. » {n}Comme vidé de ses dernières forces, Heinrix se détourne de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix recule d'un pas et vous lance un regard choqué avant de retrouver son expression stoïque habituelle un instant plus tard.{/n} « Il suffit. Vous avez raison, xénos. À propos de ceci... {n}Heinrix hésite et éprouve manifestement quelques difficultés à finir sa phrase.{/n} ... et au sujet de différentes autres choses également. » {n}Comme vidé de ses dernières forces, Heinrix se détourne de vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix da un paso atrás y te mira sorprendido. Pasado un momento, su rostro recupera su habitual expresión estoica.{/n} «Ya basta. Tienes razón, xenos. Sobre esto...». {n}Heinrix titubea, como si le costara pronunciar sus siguientes palabras.{/n} «Y sobre otras cosas también». {n}Como si le quedaran pocas fuerzas, Heinrix se aparta de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix da un paso atrás y te mira sorprendido. Pasado un momento, su rostro recupera su habitual expresión estoica.{/n} «Ya basta. Tienes razón, xenos. Sobre esto...». {n}Heinrix titubea, como si le costara pronunciar sus siguientes palabras.{/n} «Y sobre otras cosas también». {n}Como si le quedaran pocas fuerzas, Heinrix se aparta de ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix weicht einen Schritt zurück und sieht dich entsetzt an. Nach einem Moment kehrt der übliche stoische Ausdruck auf sein Gesicht zurück.{/n} "Das reicht. Ihr habt recht, Xenos. In diesem Punkt ..." {n}Heinrix zögert angesichts seiner nächsten Worte.{/n} "... und auch in einigen anderen." {n}Als hätte er keinerlei Kraft mehr, wendet sich Heinrix von dir ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix weicht einen Schritt zurück und sieht dich entsetzt an. Nach einem Moment kehrt der übliche stoische Ausdruck auf sein Gesicht zurück.{/n} "Das reicht. Ihr habt recht, Xenos. In diesem Punkt ..." {n}Heinrix zögert angesichts seiner nächsten Worte.{/n} "... und auch in einigen anderen." {n}Als hätte er keinerlei Kraft mehr, wendet sich Heinrix von dir ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir adım geriye gidip şok içinde sana bakıyor. Çok geçmeden yeniden tipik duygusuz surat ifadesine bürünüyor.{/n} "Yeter. Haklısın zeno. Hem bu konuda..." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor, söyleyeceklerini ağzından çıkarmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "Hem de diğer konuda." {n}Heinrix, takati kalmamışçasına sana arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix takes a step back and looks at you in shock. After a moment, his face regains its usual stoic expression.{/n} "That is enough. You are right, xenos. About this..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, struggling to say the next words.{/n} "...and about other things too." {n}As if drained of the last of his strength, Heinrix turns away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix bir adım geriye gidip şok içinde sana bakıyor. Çok geçmeden yeniden tipik duygusuz yüz ifadesine bürünüyor.{/n} "Yeter. Haklısın zeno. Bu konuda..." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor, söyleyeceklerini ağzından çıkarmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "...Ve diğer konuda da." {n}Heinrix, takati kalmamışçasına sana arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
